title: Invalid Server Certificate from Thunderbird
content: Following a recent update to Thunderbird, I lost connectivity to my email server. Here is the message from Thunderbird - "The certificate for pop.scdconline.org is not valid for that server." The current version of Thunderbird on my Windows 11 PC is 141.0 (2025072114:12:26). It was installed on 7/22/25 at 2:18:53PM. The last email I received through Thunderbird was on 7/23/25 at 6:18PM (EDT). I can still access the email account using webmail. Prior to this issue, I have been using Thunderbird for this email account since the first of this year with no issues. I'm out of idea, any suggestions?

title: What happened to spam folders?
content: I upgraded Thunderbird a few days ago to 141.0 (64 bit). Today, I note the spam folders in both of my email accounts are missing. So where is spam email going? Is the software automatically routing it into the JUNK folder? If not, how do I resurrect my spam folders?

title: Androidos Thunderbird automatikus frissítés és értesítés
content:
Kedves Thunderbird!

Évtizedek óta használom a Thunderbird-öt teljes megelégedésemre, amit ezúton is köszönök Önöknek.

Néhány hónapja letöltöttem androidos telefonomra is, de nem szinkronizál a háttérben és nem értesít, ha új e-mailem érkezik. Amikor megnyitom az appot, akkor mindent azonnal megcsinál, de így nem az igazi. Mi lehet az oka?
